## Variables.getOrCreateVariablePackage() function

Helper function to look up or create a variable on the given workspace. If no variable exists, creates and returns it.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getOrCreateVariablePackage(workspace: Workspace, id: string | null, opt_name?: string, opt_type?: string): IVariableModel<IVariableState>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | The workspace to search for the variable. It may be a flyout workspace or main workspace. |
|  id | string \| null | The ID to use to look up or create the variable, or null. |
|  opt\_name | string | _(Optional)_ The string to use to look up or create the variable. |
|  opt\_type | string | _(Optional)_ The type to use to look up or create the variable. |

**Returns:**

[IVariableModel](./blockly.ivariablemodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate.md)<!-- -->&gt;

The variable corresponding to the given ID or name + type combination.
